attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app is Terrible!! Took forever to download and takes up so much space! Also downloaded hundreds of viruses onto my phone! now it starts typing out of nowhere and gives me random notifications from random emails and numbers! DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: The worst app on the App Store
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope of finding factual evidence to vote for trump. Instead all I found was a glitchy, badly made app that crashed my phone multiple times. You’d think that a “presidental app” wouldn’t be so shoddily made. They should just remake the entire app

attributes.title: not a dog kicker
attributes.review: he kicked my dog. i downloaded the app and out of no where, cheeto boy appears in my doorway. my family watched in tears as he walked over to our dog and kicked her and called her a b!tch. he was wearing plastic bags as shoes for some reason but we did not question it. as he left he poured gasoline on the front porch and set it aflame. as he stood on our driveway he said “fake news” as he disappeared into thin air. so there i was, with a kicked dog, a crying family, and a house on fire, and all i could think was “i should probably delete that app.”

attributes.title: made maggots come out of my phone
attributes.review: This app ruined my life for, every time I went on at least 30 maggots would crawl out of the charging port. they would crawl all over my phone for hours until i sprinkled salt on them. If trump wants to send me maggots I sure won’t send him my vote!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE 🤬TERRIBLE😡 TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I got this app to see why people would vote for Donald trump and now that I downloaded it my entire phone has been acting up. I can’t take pictures or FaceTime people anymore. I am so angry. I really hope and pray that he doesn’t win this election he does not deserve this country!

attributes.title: Just.. no
attributes.review: I opened the app and it made my phone crash almost immediately. I thought it might just be a fluke so I opened it again, but then I found it was full of racists, sexist propaganda. Sorry, but I will NOT be downloading this again. 0/5 for being terrible

attributes.title: This app is the worst!!
attributes.review: Not only will it glitch out on you SO much, but it tracks you!! It will read all of your bank account information and will use your location!!! If you want your privacy DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! Two of my credit cards got HACKED after I downloaded.

attributes.title: For all my orange lovers 😻💞👄💞
attributes.review: I came from tick tock and heard how great this app was I also love the color orange and the fruit orange 😼😼 but then my app crashed and my phone no longer worked how am I writing this you may ask well I’m on my corona pod 😻😻😻 guys don’t get this app or you will get naked pictures of an old saggy orange ew 😿😾🙀

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to se why we should vote for a white supremacist but i could not i gina any valid reasons. the app was also lagging a lot so it's not a very good app in general. So for that along with the deficits ion put cheeto puff president had made it gets one star when it actually deserves les than that

attributes.title: Cheeto 🟠🔶🟧
attributes.review: I am truly disappointed and cannot believe I was tricked into downloading this app! I thought if I downloaded this app I would get a free bag of Cheetos but it turns out everyone ended up getting a Cheeto colored president Cheeto. I’m pretty sure a bag of Cheetos is more competent to be president. Such a shame the government failed its people I MEAN I MEAN THIS APP FAILED.  🤮🤢🤬
